title: N.B. COVID-19 roundup: Economic uncertainty closes Fredericton's Northside Market permanently
description: The Northside Market in Fredericton has permanently closed, leaving dozens of venders without a place to sell their products.
content: The Northside Market in Fredericton has permanently closed leaving dozens of venders without a place to sell their products The market made the announcement in a Facebook post Thursday night blaming the closure on the COVID outbreak We are all uns chars
